lead_paragraph: If this turns out to be Thomas Bach's defining moment, here's what the leader of the International Olympic Committee will be remembered for: keeping Russia as part of the club, but losing the trust of thousands of athletes who thought that, maybe this year, they'd get the answers they've been looking for.

headline.print_headline: Analysis: Russia Stays, and Clean Athletes Scratch Heads
headline.main: Analysis: Russia Stays, and Clean Athletes Scratch Heads
